title: Bilbo, Retired Adventurer (1R284)
text:
Set:	The Fellowship of the Ring
Kind:	Free People
Culture:	Shire
Twilight:	2
Card Type:	Ally • Home 3 • Hobbit
Strength:	2
Vitality:	3
Site:	3
Game Text:	Fellowship: Exert Bilbo to shuffle a [Shire] card from your discard pile into your draw deck.
Lore:	”'…I don't suppose I have the strength or luck left to deal with the Ring. It has grown, and I have not.'”
Rarity:	R
Notes:	Card title is an erratum. Image fixed
